name: The market trader
description:
This is a trading and city building strategy game.
You control a trader who develop a village.You earn money by trading the produced products myself or others to other villages.
For example crap,cloth,wood,milk,book,sword,shield,shell,gem

There is villagers who creates buildings in the village where the trader is located.They fight,produce,eat,work depending on your order.
And The same is true for Another Villagers in other village.You can develop other villages by trade.
If you set up bars and arenas in the developed other village, residents enter there and you can make money.

Money makes jealousy. Thieves will attack the developed village, so let's prepare defense forces such as cannons and warriors.

The basis of trade is to buy cheaply and sell it high.
Every village, every seasons,every timing , products which villagers want to have are different.
Let's sell the right item at the right time.

The success or failure of your village depends on the appropriate management of risks and resources.
